item.title: One weird hack to improve your browsing
item.author: pranavgade20@gmail.com (Pranav Gade)
item.description: Browsers are great. They make the Internet accessible, and parse weird-looking HTML into a beautiful document. However, organizing and looking for tabs in modern browsers is a mess. I often have quite a few tabs open from the same website, where the title is often something like Website name - page name. Now, although the website name is important, it takes up unnecessary space in the title of the page. So, the page name is usually rendered as Website name - pa.
